scripts.ios:dev: ENVFILE=config/env.dev yarn ios:update-config && ENVFILE=config/env.dev react-native run-ios --scheme=smartPlatformRN-dev
scripts.ios:staging: ENVFILE=config/env.staging yarn ios:update-config && ENVFILE=config/env.staging react-native run-ios --scheme smartPlatformRN-staging
scripts.ios:staging:release: yarn ios:update-config && ENVFILE=config/env.staging react-native run-ios --scheme smartPlatformRN-staging
scripts.ios:prod: ENVFILE=config/env.production yarn ios:update-config && ENVFILE=config/env.production react-native run-ios --scheme=smartPlatformRN-production
scripts.build:ios:dev: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-dev -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-dev.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:dev:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-dev -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-dev.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:staging: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-staging -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-staging.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:staging:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-staging -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-staging.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:prod: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-production -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-production.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:prod:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace smartPlatformRN.xcworkspace -scheme smartPlatformRN-production -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS archive -archivePath build/smartPlatformRN-production.xcarchive
scripts.rename-app: read -p 'Enter New App Name: ' newName && read -p 'Enter New Bundle ID (e.g., com.example.app): ' newBundleId && npx react-native-rename "$newName" -b "$newBundleId"
scripts.assets:set-icon: npx react-native set-icon --path smart-assets/icon.png --platform android && npx react-native set-icon --path smart-assets/icon.png --platform ios
scripts.postassets:set-icon: echo 'App icons generated. Remember to clean builds (./android/gradlew clean, rm -rf ios/build) and reinstall pods (cd ios && pod install --repo-update) before rebuilding.'
scripts.customize-app: yarn assets:set-icon && yarn assets:generate-splash && echo 'App customization complete! Clean builds and reinstall pods.'
scripts.link:packages: cd ios && pod install --repo-update && cd ../android && ./gradlew clean
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock && cd ../android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && yarn install
